oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John F. Ward correspondence with Raymond B. Witt, 1968 December 27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ward, John F.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Louisiana attorney John F. Ward to Raymond B. Witt regarding "the numbers game" in desegregation cases and federal oversight in the south.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Law and legislation
